member.name: T:Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility.Platform.Android.ImageCache
member.summary: I setup the access to all the cache elements to be async because if I didn't then it was locking up the GC and freezing the entire app

member.name: T:Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility.Platform.Android.IImageViewHandler
member.summary: The successor to IImageSourceHandler, the goal being we can achieve better performance by never creating an Android.Graphics.Bitmap instance

member.name: T:Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility.Platform.Android.TextColorSwitcher
member.summary: Handles color state management for the TextColor property for Entry, Button, Picker, TimePicker, and DatePicker

member.name: P:Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility.Platform.Android.VisualElementRenderer`1.ManageNativeControlLifetime
member.summary: Determines whether the native control is disposed of when this renderer is disposed Can be overridden in deriving classes

member.name: T:Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility.Platform.UAP.BootstrapHelper
member.summary: Enables C++ code to simulate ICLRRuntimeHost2::ExecuteAssembly on top of ICLRRuntimeHost2::CreateDelegate in .net core 2.
